ModMetaData.name: SheathYourSword
ModMetaData.author: NukaFrog Gloomylynx
ModMetaData.description:
Draw Sheath and Sword
Three example swords are added to this mod. You can make them by referring to these.
There are two components.
CompProperties_WeaponExtention It allows to adjust custom position when holding the weapon.
CompProperties_Sheath It draws a Sheath, when pawn drafted or not.
